name: PortmanIoTSystem
0:
”Alexa, ask digi man to Engine start Toyota.”
”Alexa, ask digi man to Lock Porsche”
”Alexa, ask digi man to Open trunk Toyota”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: digi man
Developer Terms of Use
des: Portman IoT DIGI Man Skill allows Portman IoT system owners to have the ability to Remote Start, Lock/Unlock, Remote open trunk, Remote enable or disable Panic function, etc… using Amazon Alexa. (Note: Portman IoT DIGI Man Skill currently supports all new 2018 Portman IoT remote starter and alarm systems.
